attributes.action: provide more support for adult evening classes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This should include requiring Boroughs to provide term by term payment options (dropped by some), as a whole year's fees may be difficult for many people to afford in one go. Also reduce the demands for classes to be 'relevant'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
